Court ordered sale and being sold as is, where is.

Would make a great rental for a few years before you decide to build. Two minutes from Richbar Golf / Nursery and North Cariboo Christian School, 10 mins to Dragon Lake fishing. Bonus, School Bus at end of driveway and great daycare nearby.

Public Remarks: This historic trapper's cabin was built in 1966. Lots of history here - you'll even find items from the original trapper in the Mackenzie museum. Beautiful 10 acres with 400' of water frontage on Williston Lake, as well as a creek, with gorgeous lake and mountain views. The lake in front of the property is known locally for big lakers, so don't leave your rod at home! Only 80 kms northwest of the town of Mackenzie and approx. 3 hrs from Prince George. The cabin is in good shape and has been well cared for; 700 sq. ft. including a bedroom, propane fridge and stove, bathroom and wood stove. Outbuildings include a small shop. Come and enjoy the world class hunting and fishing from your own slice of recreational heaven.
Realtor Remarks: Find more information and pictures at www.mccowans.com.

Public Remarks: Recreational property at its best (and cutest). Calling all sledders, skiers and hunters! This completely rebuilt 2 bedroom log cabin with detached garage is right smack dab in the middle of it all! Hasler Flats is an area 20 kms west of Chetwynd...1 hour drive to Powder King. Leave your front yard and head up into the mountains for a day of sledding or hunting. The Pine River runs north or property, or perhaps you live in Chetwynd and want to relocate to enjoy some rural living. Peaceful and quiet with beautiful views, this home has a landscaped yard and large deck to enjoy your surroundings. There is a wood stove for heat, electric baseboard heaters, cistern for water, and septic system (also 200 amp service).

The home also features a fully functioning engineered septic system and proper drinking water system. The two loft bedrooms provide some privacy, while the kitchen living area overlook the lake and are a great headquarter for enjoying lakefront living!Seasonal access by road, and year round access by boat or snow machine, this home away from home is ready for your family event.
